name: Prateek SAXENA
title: Associate Professor
researcharea: Security, Algorithms & Theory, Systems & Networking
interests: My research asks aims to build better security and privacy in practical systems. The work involves combining formal reasoning, tools and ideas from several domains of computer science such as languages, verification, applied cryptography and distributed systems. Our work has resulted in several practical artifacts powering real-world systems.
